successes.title: Nanoleaf One - The world's most energy efficient lightbulb!
successes.description: A new LED lightbulb that is the most energy efficient on the planet. The Nanoleaf One takes energy efficient lighting to the next level.

Pledges.description: Thank you from the NanoLight team and a shoutout on Twitter. As a small startup, we really appreciate any support we can get.
One 10W NanoLight (75W-Equivalent). Available in Black or White. FREE Shipping.
One 10W NanoLight (75W-Equivalent). Available in Black or White. FREE International Shipping.
One WHITE 10W NanoLight (75W-Equivalent). FREE International Shipping.
One BLACK 10W NanoLight (75W-Equivalent). FREE International Shipping.
One WHITE 10W NanoLight (75W-Equivalent). FREE International Shipping.
One BLACK 10W NanoLight (75W-Equivalent). FREE International Shipping.
With LEAF Design - One White 10W NanoLight (75W-Equivalent). Free International Shipping
One 12W NanoLight (100W-Equivalent). Available in Black or White. FREE Shipping.
One 12W NanoLight (100W-Equivalent). Available in Black or White. FREE Shipping.
One BLACK 12W NanoLight (100W-Equivalent). FREE International Shipping.
One WHITE 12W NanoLight (100W-Equivalent). FREE International Shipping.
One WHITE 12W NanoLight (100W-Equivalent). FREE International Shipping.
With LEAF Design - One White 12W NanoLight (100W-Equivalent). Free International Shipping

Exclusive 12W NanoLight that produces >1800 Lumens output. Even brighter than 100W-Equivalents. Creating using the best components available without any regard for price. Available in Black or White. FREE Shipping.

Exclusive 12W NanoLight that produces >1800 Lumens output. Even brighter than 100W-Equivalents. Creating using the best components available without any regard for price. Available in Black or White. FREE Shipping.
Exclusive WHITE 12W NanoLight that produces >1800 Lumens output. Even brighter than 100W-Equivalents. Creating using the best components available without any regard for price. FREE Shipping.
Exclusive BLACK 12W NanoLight that produces >1800 Lumens output. Even brighter than 100W-Equivalents. Creating using the best components available without any regard for price. FREE Shipping.

With LEAF Design - Exclusive WHITE 12W NanoLight that produces >1800 Lumens output. Even brighter than 100W-Equivalents. Creating using the best components available without any regard for price. FREE International Shipping.

One 10W NanoLight (75W Equivalent), One 12W NanoLight (100W Equivalent) and One Exclusive 12W NanoLight (>1800 Lumens). Also, you will be added as a contributor for making the NanoLight a reality on our website. Available in Black or White. Free Shipping!

One 10W NanoLight (75W Equivalent), One 12W NanoLight (100W Equivalent) and One Exclusive 12W NanoLight (>1800 Lumens). Also, you will be added as a contributor for making the NanoLight a reality on our website. Available in Black or White. LEAF design optional. Free International Shipping!

Exclusive 12W NanoLight that produces >1800 Lumens output that has a personalized message engraved into shell of the NanoLight. Your name will also be added to the contributor list that will be shipped with each NanoLight.
The most energy efficient of all NanoLights - The single world's most energy efficient light bulb!

We guarantee that from all the light bulbs we produce, this bulb will be the best! It will come with a testing report and a certificate of thanks that will describe some of the things that the generous contribution will allow us to do.
